mapper.select: select g.id, g.innerID, g.guaranteeSum, ddgs.statName as guaranteeStat, ddgw.guaranteeWayName as guaranteeWay, ddf.corporateName as finance, g.occurpyTime, g.forInnerID from guarantee g LEFT JOIN dd_guaranteestat ddgs on g.guaranteeStat = ddgs.statCode LEFT JOIN dd_guaranteeway ddgw on g.guaranteeWay = ddgw.guaranteeWayCode LEFT JOIN dd_financeorg ddf on g.financeCode = ddf.financeCode where g.innerID = #{innerID}
